deposit.attachmentInstructionsTitle: Required: Send {{assetTicker}} with deposit address in Description field.
deposit.attachmentInstructionsText:
Insert: {span.error-500.bold}[{{walletAddress}}]
into the Description field.
{span.error-500.bold}[Note]
: Deposit address must be included in the description field, otherwise may result in the loss of deposit.
deposit.depositInstructionsTitle: Important: This address is for one time use only and can only accept one deposit!
deposit.depositInstructionsText: You must wait for your initial {{assetTicker}} deposit to be confirmed on the Turtle Network blockchain before receiving another {{assetTicker}} deposit address for the Turtle Network. If you make more than one {{assetTicker}} deposit to the same deposit address you will lose those deposits.
deposit.tunnelInstructions:
To deposit {{assetTicker}} into the Turtle Network you must use a tunnel provided at [{{tunnelUrl}}]({{tunnelUrl}}). Warning! Tunnels are one time use only
and will be permanantly closed after that one use! Sending more than one deposit through the same tunnel will result in the loss of that deposit!
deposit.pleaseNote: Please note that the gateway doesn't apply any fees for this operation.
deposit.title: Deposit {{assetName}}

step1.button: What you need to know about your SEED
step1.p1: Please take some time to understand some important things for your own safety. üôè
step1.p2: We cannot recover your funds or freeze your account if you visit a phishing site or lose your backup phrase (aka SEED phrase).
step1.p3: By continuing to use our platform, you agree to accept all risks associated with the loss of your SEED, including but not limited to the inability to obtain your funds and dispose of them. In case you lose your SEED, you agree and acknowledge that the Turtle Network Platform would not be responsible for the negative consequences of this.
step1.title: Welcome to the Turtle Network Ecosystem!

step2.cell1: You use your wallet anonymously, meaning your account is not connected to an email account or any other identifying data.
step2.cell2: Your password protects your account when working on a certain device or browser. It is needed in order to ensure that your secret phrase is not saved in storage.
step2.cell3: If you forget your password, you can easily create a new one by using the account recovery form via your secret phrase. If you lose your secret phrase, however, you will have no way to access your account.
step2.cell4: You cannot change your secret phrase. If you accidentally sent it to someone or suspect that scammers have taken it over, then create a new Turtle Network wallet immediately and transfer your funds to it.
step2.p1: When registering your account, you will be asked to save your secret phrase (SEED) and to protect your account with a password. On normal centralized servers, special attention is paid to the password, which can be changed and reset via email, if the need arises. However, on decentralized platforms such as Turtle Network, everything is arranged differently:
step2.title: What you need to know about your SEED

step3.cell2: Do not use browsers that have extensions or plugins to access your account.
step3.cell3: Do not open emails or links from unknown senders.
step3.cell4Web: Regularly update your browser and operating system.
step3.cell5: Use official security software. Do not install unknown software which could be hacked.
step3.cell6: Do not access your wallet when using public Wi-Fi or someone else‚Äôs device.
step3.p1: One of the most common forms of scamming is phishing, which is when scammers create fake communities on Facebook or other websites that look similar to the authentic ones.
step3.title: How To Protect Yourself from Phishers
